outline:
1. to go, to go away, to go about
    1. (Qal)
      1. to go away
      2. to go about
      3. to be used up, be exhausted, be gone, evaporated
    2. (Pual) to go to and fro
kjv_def: fail, gad about, go to and fro (but in Ezekiel 27:19 the word is rendered by many 'from Uzal,' by others 'yarn'), be gone (spent).
strongs_def: to go away, hence, to disappear
